Description:
Detects usage of "ProtocolHandler" to download files. Downloaded files will be located in the cache folder (for example - %LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\IE)


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: File Download Using ProtocolHandler.exe
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\protocolhandler.exe' and original_file_name = 'protocolhandler.exe') and (command like '%ftp://%' or command like '%http://%' or command like '%https://%'))
